nodes.text: The Allied Armada was a naval squadron of the Alliance to Restore the Republic that participated in the Battle of Xorrn during the Galactic Civil War against the Galactic Empire. It arrived on Xorrn several days after the undercover rebel agent Nath Alico warned the Rebel Alliance about the Empire's plan to attack Xorrn.

When the force arrived in the Xorrn system, it reinforced the anti-Imperial allied group on the surface and attacked the Imperial task force of Captain Ralchio Nervi that consisted of the Gladiator-class Star Destroyer Blood Ambition and the two Raider-class corvettes; Sargantuan and Warhawk.

The Allied Armada consisted of two MC80 Liberty Type Heavy Star Cruisers, two MC30C Frigates, one GR-75 medium transport, and four other starships. Additionally, the naval squadron contained six fighter wings.
